Content.Text:
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Morning, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>'s been bugging me to play outside
all day.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*yawn* I'm still kinda sleepy.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We're gonna play house today.
<PAGE>
I always do what <CHILD_NAME_M> wants, so today
we're gonna play my way!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>. Are you still busy today? Hang in
there!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>, you want to play with us today?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A whole bunch of stuff happened today! I can't
wait to tell you all about it!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>. Done with work today?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*yawn* ...I think I'm gettin' a little sleepy.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This weather's beautiful!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Lotta rain today. Think I'm just gonna play in the
house.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's really hot today! Hope I don't get sunburned.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lotta rain today. Think I'm just gonna play in the
house.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love this weather!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lotta rain today. Think I'm just gonna play in the
house.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love this weather!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hope we get enough snow for a snowball fight,
'cause then I'm gonna kick <CHILD_NAME_M>'s butt!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>? Is the wind gonna blow our house
away?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're gonna have to shovel all this snow
tomorrow. And I'm gonna help! Pinkie promise!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are there really spirits around here? <CHILD_NAME_M>
said so.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There're rabbits around here. They're so cute! ...I
get kinda scared when they get too close,
though.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's a grave down by the river. I wonder
whose it is...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've got a field here?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it must be tough to climb up here every
day and farm here.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it must be tough to climb up here every
day and farm here.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> told me there's a biiig beetle around
here.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who's using this field again? There's so many,
sometimes I forget.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This garden's great! I can make wreaths out of
the flowers here.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love playing outside, but I like playing house
too. I never have enough time to play everything.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry. I'll be back before dark.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>. Can you play with me today?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>? Is <CHILD_NAME_M> my big brother or
my little brother?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, can you take me into town next time you
go?
<PAGE>
I wanna see the stores and the people and stuff.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes when I play outside, I see a boy and
a girl. I wonder if they're brother and sister like
me and <CHILD_NAME_M>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>, are me and <CHILD_NAME_M>, like, the
same? How different are we?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>? Can we go on a trip sometime?
You know, the whole family?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I get a little bigger, can I help with the
farm work?
<PAGE>
I can just picture all of us working together to
make the farm grow. It's gonna be fun!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Wow, for me? Yay! My favorite! I love you,
<PARENT>! Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Oh, this's for me? Thank you! I like it!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're giving me this? Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Th-thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You wanna give me this...? Bleh, I hate these.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I know you don't like it when I'm picky, but I
really, really hate this... Guess I'll take it,
though...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, sparkly! And it's a present for me? Thank
you, <PARENT>. I love you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's shiny! I like it!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <PARENT>. I love you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's twinkling! You're giving me this?
Thank you, <PARENT>. I love you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It looks nice, but, um... I mean th-thank you.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks nice, but, um... I mean th-thank you.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks nice, but, um... I mean th-thank you.
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I don't want it.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you just gave me something, remember?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Ooh, I love these!
<PAGE>
This is a birthday present for me, right?! Thank
you! My favorite! I love you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Oh, I like these! Thank you! Aww, what a great
birthday present!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is for my birthday, right? Thank you! I'm so
happy!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is this a birthday present for me? Thanks,
<PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, this...this is a birthday present, right? Th-
thanks.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is for my birthday...? I, um, I don't really
like these, but if it's a birthday present...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I hate to be picky, but I really don't like this... I
mean, I'll take it, 'cause it's my birthday, but...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Oh, a twinkly <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! Is this a
birthday present? Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>It's twinkling! It's for me, for my birthday,
right...? Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks nice, but... I mean, th-thank you! F-for
this...great...birthday present.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Aww, bunnies are so cute! But I'm scared to get
too close to them.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...This doesn't bite, does it?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's an ermine! It's so cute!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You know, now that I get this close, this
thing's face is really funny.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You know, penguins don't look as cute when
you get this close.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wah! It looks like it's about to jump at me!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aww, a cute little parrot! Does it talk? Hello!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that's cute.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a weird-looking bunny! But I like its fur.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a cute little chick!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That thing's beak is gonna poke me if I get too
close.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHARANAME0> really likes me. Watch this...
Heel!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Wow, <CHARANAME0> got all fat.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think <CHARANAME0> likes <CHILD_NAME_M> better
than me.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Wow, <CHARANAME0> got all fat.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHARANAME0>'s lookin' good today, as usual.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Wow, <CHARANAME0> got all fat.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like <CHARANAME0>'s fur. It's so warm and
cuddly!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Wow, <CHARANAME0> got all fat.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a pretty flower! Huh? The Flower
Fair's today? Thank you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a blue feather! You give it to somebody you
love when you want to marry them, right? That's
so sweet!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that your ring, <PARENT>? It's so beautiful! I
want one someday!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is really pretty wrapping! Is this for
me? Oh, I gotta know what's in there!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Oh, I gotta know what's in there.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I love you lots! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I love you lots!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I love you lots!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
How come you never talk to me anymore?
<PAGE>
Are you just real busy with work? I wanna hang
out and play with my <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love how the animals here are so happy!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't know how to put this, but it almost feels
like the animals here are saying "welcome."

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm usually too scared to get close to wild
animals, but these ones are friendly, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a cute apron! I wanna wear it, too! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>, you look cool in that outfit!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a real stylin' outfit, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hoodie's got a nice color.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, I like that kimono thing you've got on!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute skirt! I like the color!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's shaped a little weird, but it's cute. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look like you're royalty from Sakura
Country! Awesome! I wanna wear that, too!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, I like those clothes. The lace looks so
pretty! Please make me something just like it. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I saw somebody dressed like that on TV. They
wear those in Sakura Country, right?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, there's checkers on the skirt and scarf! So
cute! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>, you look cool in that outfit!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's a ninja outfit, right?! I bet <CHILD_NAME_M>
likes it! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look great in that outfit!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a cat! Where did you come from?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, it's a dog! Where did you come from?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, a bear! Where did you come from?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, a panda! Where did you come from?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, a penguin! Where did you come from?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wh-where are you going in that armor? Are you
gonna fight a dragon, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that red hat! It's cute!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that red hat! It's cute!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, a flower clip! I want one. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that red hat! It's cute!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a real cute hairband! I like the lace.
It's so beautiful. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look like a ruler in that costume! Does
that make me the princess? Sweet!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those red glasses really good on you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those red glasses really good on you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those red glasses really good on you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're wearing one of those...um...
<PAGE>
You know, those things butlers wear.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...<PARENT>, play with me...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't...feel too good...today...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*yawwwn* Gettin' kinda sleepy...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>, want to play with us today?
